originalText.text: I have worked with Focus Lighting for many years, collaborating on various hospitality projects for notable clients. The team at Focus is professional and knowledgeable, making the design process seamless from concept through construction. Given that lighting and ambiance play a key role in every design, I would highly recommend this firm to bring your vision to life.

originalText.text: I have worked with Focus Lighting since 2017 and return to them time and time again thanks to their professionalism and experience in the lighting industry. Not only have they been a pleasure to work with, but repeatedly offered unique and efficient solutions to our architectural lighting needs.

text.text: I have worked with Focus Lighting since 2017 and return to them time and time again thanks to their professionalism and experience in the lighting industry. Not only have they been a pleasure to work with, but repeatedly offered unique and efficient solutions to our architectural lighting needs.

originalText.text: As an owner operator I have never worked with anyone better.  I worked with Focus on my 20K feet members club (Zero Bond) in NYC and it couldn't have been a better investment of time and money.  Their diligence, timeliness, and attention to detail is second to none and shows in the finished product. I highly recommend them to any operators looking for help with lighting design and install

originalText.text: As Director of Design, Knoll, Inc, I have had the pleasure to engage Focus Lighting as our lighting consultant for Knoll Showrooms worldwide.  Always a successful end result, on deadline and on budget no matter the size of the project.  Recognized most recently and congratulated by the Knoll Exec Team for their excellent lighting design work on the Knoll NY Showroom project designed by ARO and the Knoll Chicago Showroom designed by Gensler, the Focus Lighting team is tops both professionally and technically.  I have had the opportunity to work directly with Focus on numerous Knoll projects over 2+ decades and have found their strong commitment, vast expertise and close attention to be unmatched.

text.text: As Director of Design, Knoll, Inc, I have had the pleasure to engage Focus Lighting as our lighting consultant for Knoll Showrooms worldwide. originalText.text: I am an owner/operator of two restaurants in Boston, MA. We worked with Focus Lighting on a total renovation of a 160-year old restaurant in 2015. The decision to hire Focus was hands-down the best return on investment that we made during the entire project. The lighting scheme developed by Ryan Fischer for Yvonne's elevated a beautiful design to a jaw-dropping level. Their procurement services were the most professional and pain-free of any agent who worked on the project. It is impossible to overstate the effect that Focus had on the finished product at Yvonne's. We are working with them now on another restaurant build-out, and I don't imagine we will ever do another project without Focus Lighting on the team.
